title: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9004", September 11, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6395/1"-1'0-/F.S./WESTY/D./ 9/11/35, 9/11/35, 2, SL./ 1, OFFICE; inscribed in graphite with materials, instructions, dimensions.
description: Plans and elevations for hardware for bedroom furniture, suite # 9004. Suite includes dresser, chest, desk, two night stands, and vanity. Circular pulls, half in English sycamore, and the other half in polished chrome.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9004", September 11, 1935.
September 11, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-917.
